TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IControlDesignerView

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for access to the visual representation and content of a control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is intended for use by design host developers.

Docs.summary: Gets the designer region that contains the associated control, if any.
Docs.value: A object if the associated control is contained in a designer region; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetBounds(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion region) cil managed

Docs.param: The for which you want to retrieve the bounds.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the outer bounds of the designer view.
Docs.returns: A containing information about the location and measurements of the view at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Invalidate(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rectangle) cil managed

Docs.param: A representing the location and outer measurements of the view on the design surface. The coordinate-system origin for this rectangle is the top-left corner of the element to which the behavior is attached.
Docs.summary: Notifies the design host that the area represented by the provided rectangle needs to be repainted on the design surface.
Gets the designer component for the naming container of the associated control, if any.
Docs.value: An IDesigner object representing the designer component for the naming container for the associated control; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetFlags (System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags viewFlags, bool setFlag);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFlags(valuetype System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags viewFlags, bool setFlag) cil managed

Docs.param: to set the flag, to cancel the flag.
Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see SetFlags.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed

Docs.param: A into which the content is to be put.
The HTML markup to be put into the designer region.
Docs.summary: Puts the provided content into the provided designer region.
Gets a value indicating whether designer regions are supported.
Docs.value: if designer regions are supported; otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Update() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes the associated control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.
An event raised by the design host for the view and designer component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ViewEvent is raised by the design host if any of the following occur:
- The user clicks on the view in the design host,
- The design host repaints the client region on the design surface,
- The user has elected to change the editing mode of an editable region corresponding to a template.
